About Me

Nickname: Elli

Full name:

Birthname: Treselles Fea Nora

Born: 21 May 2010 (age 14) Ulvila, Finland

Parents: Hero (father) and Victoria (mother)

Siblings: 1 sister and 1 brother

Breed: British Shorthair

Color: Blue

Elli is not just an ordinary feline but the true mastermind of the household. His hobbies include stealthy explorations of the neighborhood, where he proudly returns with tales of his adventures told through purrs and meows. Inside, Elli is an avid bird-watcher, spending hours perched on the windowsill, eyes darting at every flutter outside. He also enjoys sunbathing in the coziest spots, ensuring he captures the warmest rays. Despite his serene demeanor, it is clear that Elli orchestrates the daily routine; his humans comply with his mealtime demands and lavish attention, knowing full well that he is the true leader, reigning with a gentle but firm paw.
